alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Clay, west central Pemiscot and east central Dunklin Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piggott, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Rector, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, Saint Francis, Crockett, Bragg City, Nimmons, Heubner, Lorine, West Kennett, Leonard, Bell City, Pratt, Hargrave Corner and Carryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
